response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its worth to you is $12,000, I propose to offer it to you for $10,000. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's value and my business objectives. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 10000}
